meanings.definition: The area or distance between two points.
meanings.sent1: The mountain range was beautiful to see.
meanings.sent2: The hikers walked across a vast range of hills.
meanings.sent3: The birds flew over the range of valleys, singing happily.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a wide range, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The endless range of the desert stretched out before them.

meanings.definition: A variety of different things within a particular category.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a wide range of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The library had a range of books for all ages.
meanings.sent3: The party had a range of snacks, from chips to cookies.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe had a colorful range of shirts and pants.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a range of artifacts from different time periods.

meanings.sent1: The temperatures can range from hot to cold in this region.
meanings.sent2: Her emotions ranged from excitement to nervousness.
meanings.sent3: His mood can range from cheerful to grumpy in a matter of minutes.
meanings.sent4: The prices of the products range depending on the quality.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the flowers ranged from bright red to soft pink.

meanings.sent1: The deer range through the forest in search of food.
meanings.sent2: The children ranged around the playground, playing tag.
meanings.sent3: The cat likes to range around the neighborhood, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: The explorers ranged across the vast plains, discovering new lands.
meanings.sent5: The birds range freely in the open sky, soaring with grace.
